name: CavelMan
description:
Grab a club, a skull and an egg, ride a dino and smash all your competitors!
  • 👨🏻 Local multiplayer (2-4 players on the same device)
  • 🎮  Xbox 360 Controller for Windows support only


 20,000 years before our era, an evolved tribe must designate its new leader.

To prove their bravery, the four pretenders to the throne have to compete for trophies and ride a powerful dinosaur.

Strength and skill will be their best assets to win the title.

At the end of this epic battle, there will be only one ...

Created by Rémi Renard, Anthony Ramon , Sylvain Meddah, Mathieu Fernandez and Nans Batailhou-Villet.
